valid_articles.Title: July 4th weekend Google Search ranking volatility / update (we have seen weekend volatility from Google for the past several weekends - reminds me of that Google bug from 6 months ago)
valid_articles.Description: Surprise, surprise, it was another weekend and we again see some more than usual ranking volatility from Google Search. Again, this reminds me of the weekend ranking bug Google had late last year into early this year. But who knows, maybe it is just a ranking system that shuffles things up for weekend searchers?
